definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on

sentences.english: Electromagnetic noises of H-field antenna dominated the receiving depth and receiving quality.
sentences.chinese: 拖曳天線的本地噪聲決定了其接收深度及接收性能。

sentences.english: Drag the gridline indicator off the grid.
sentences.chinese: 將格線指示區拖曳到方格外。

sentences.english: As well, there may be more server shuffling as Classic ramps down.
sentences.chinese: 必須有也許是更多服務器拖曳象經典舷梯下來。

sentences.english: Her dress swept along the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她的裙裾拖曳在地板上。

sentences.english: Its drag and drop feature is like a slicing on the cake.
sentences.chinese: 他的拖曳功能很像切蛋糕。

sentences.english: Many planes and tows were blown far off course.
sentences.chinese: 許多飛機以及拖曳物皆被吹離航線。

sentences.english: Gravity is tugging on my eyelids.
sentences.chinese: 地心引力不懈地拖曳着我的眼皮。

sentences.english: In the same way, the Earth drags spacetime with it.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“同樣的道理，地球也會拖曳時空一起旋轉。”

sentences.english: Remove the tow hook from the lower crossmember.
Click to draw dots or drag to draw strokes.
sentences.chinese: 點擊可以畫點，拖曳則畫出手繪的形狀。

sentences.english: Click or drag to erase pixels of the foreground color.
sentences.chinese: 按一下或拖曳可擦除前景色的像素。

sentences.english: The vertically loaded anchor (VLA) is a new-type drag anchor used for deepwater foundations.
sentences.chinese: 法向承力錨是一種新型的拖曳嵌入式繫泊基礎。

sentences.english: Tugboat towing ports, no sewage, there is repatriation facilities.
sentences.chinese: 港口有拖輪拖曳，無排污，有遣返設施。

sentences.english: Press and hold it again when you drag the artifacts to the diagram.
sentences.chinese: 將成品至拖曳圖表時，再次按住該鍵不放。

sentences.english: All of a sudden, she forgot how to click and drag.
sentences.chinese: 突然，她忘記了怎麼單擊和拖曳。

sentences.english: Viewers will learn to control many odd laymen shuffles .
sentences.chinese: 觀察者將學會控制許多奇怪的外行拖曳。

definition: to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
to catapult/to launch/to eject (from a plane)/to shoot
to slide/to coast/to glide/(of an aircraft) to taxi
tugboat/boat towed by a tugboat/to tow a boat
